metadata.title: WebLite English Translation
metadata.summary: WebLite's primary English translation. Unfortunately, as WebLite isn't fully translatable, it does fall short. WebLite 4.0 will be fully translatable.

languagePack.phrases:
images/favicon.png blue
FreezeMessenger Beta 3 (DEV BUILD) You see... our incredibly high standards of admittance, or perhaps just our unjust bias, has resulted in us unfairly denying you access to this probably-not-worth-your time room. We do apologize for being such snobs... but yet, we still are. So, we must now ask you to leave. You are not a part of this group, rather you are only granted access because you are an administrator. Please respect user privacy: do not post in this group unwanted, and moreover do not spy without due reason. We're sorry, but for the time being you have been banned from the chat. You may contact an administrator for more information. We're Sorry2 This room is not an official room, and as such is not actively moderated. Please excercise caution when talking to people you do not know, and do not reveal personal information. This room is a private room between you and another individual, and is not accessible to any other user or administrator. If you would like to ignore this person right click their userName and choose "Ignore". After hours of intense computation, we have failed to locate the room you selected. You have been banned from creating rooms. Your group was successfully created at: Room creation has been disabled.
Reset Create Room Unknown Action <!DOCTYPE HTML>
Unsuccessful Login Guest Links Hello. Please Enter Your Login Credentials Below: You appeared to have entered a wrong password. Remeber, passwords are case sensitive.
